Dok.title: The People's Bugbear
Dok.description: An altruistic bugbear. Wants to improve other's conditions.

Papa Kap.title: The Dwarven Chef
Papa Kap.description: A fatherly dwarf. Especially proficient with cook's tools.

Xoh.title: The Neurotic Changeling
Xoh.description: A young woman who hides behind alternate identities.
Xoh.traits: There's nothing I like more than a good mystery.
Xoh.ideals: Change. Life is like the seasons, in constant change, and we must change with it.
Xoh.bonds: I owe my life to the monastery that took me in when my parents died.
Xoh.flaws: I can't let others see my inner turmoil.

Xed.title: The Angsty Drow
Xed.description: An edgy teenage boy. Real name, Kevin.

Gob.title: The Investigative Hobgoblin
Gob.description: This hobgoblin is much more interested in deduction than violence.

Wrett.title: The Beefy Lizardman
Wrett.description: A mute, muscled, anthropomorphic bearded dragon. Loves pranks.

Zazz.title: The Human Monk
Zazz.description: A modest young man. Loves horses and light magic.
